original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmin nigrodha ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhun upassayam upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadanti

original: “Yampi mayaṁ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
analyzed: yam pi maya ayye gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā ayyā chabbaggiyā idha iva āgantvā amhe ovadanti iti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṁ na gacchissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ovādam na gacchissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṁ na gacchantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ovādam na gacchanti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṁ na gacchissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ovādam na gacchissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṁvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā sa vāsāya vā na gaccheyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: Ovādāya vā saṁvāsāya vā na gacchissāmīti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ovādāya vā sa vāsāya vā na gacchissāmi iti dhuram nikkhitta matte āpatti pācittiyassa
